person.persName: John J. Lightfoot (Bath County, Kentucky, druggist)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, druggist. Kentucky native. Son of Katherine Lightfoot. Married to Elizabeth Downing Lightfoot in Lancaster, Kentucky, on September 24, 1855. Father of William Lightfoot, John Lightfoot, Mathew Lightfoot, Fannie Lightfoot, and Eliza Lightfoot. Clerk in Bath County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Druggist in Owingsville in 1860.
